prologue: There will be 2 kits born to a kittypet queen. Be haste for they are not as they seem...

chapters.1: Ivy chased Coal through the backyard while silence watched from the glass barrier...
chapters.2: Ivy wakes up as the sun was starting to rise. They stretched slowly...
chapters.3: Ivy opened their eyes, noticing a dark stinking forest around them...
chapters.4: 'Even in here, even from as far away as the Bright Waves, nobody can hear you scream'...
chapters.5: Ivy and Coal wake up the next morning when the sun was barely a claw-scratch in the sky...
chapters.6: Ivy padded silently behind their father. Their mind was whirling with thoughts of the fox...
